channel.title: My 1st ever script
channel.description:
well here it is it is very basic as im new to the scene but plz post proggies etc and things wat u cud improve on ty
{ ~~~~_my1stbasicscript_BY~~~~ ~~~ _Scaper123_ ~~~ +~+~+~+~+~+~+~_1.0_+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+ +_________+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+_________+ ~ Scaper_2007@msn.com ~ ====================================================================================================== +~+ SCAR 3.12~DIVI,SRL4 +~+ ====================================================================================================== ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ How to use: setup right below, that explains most of it please rember its my 1st script ever, note that this Basicautocuter won't work most area surronded by lots of trees i prefer to chop willows that are bulked together +~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~drops every 27 ore normaly! [WATCH TO LOADS]!!+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+ You can have Axe equipped/unequiped as it auto clicks jus have the right wcin lvl for the axe,don't wear any valuable items!! follow guied lines click play and enjoy remember to post progs bugs and anything else related I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILTY IF U GET BANNED USE AT YOUR OWN RISK NO ANTI/BAN/RANDOM AT PRESENT. IF U WANT TO FLAME ME ON ANYTHING PLZ REMBER THIS IS MY 1ST SCRIPT AND OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS ALL WILL BE CREDITED WHEN IM COMFORTABLE ABOUT IT I STRONGLY ADVISE TO AUTO PROBLY I MEEN WITH: CHAR CB LVL ABOVE 10 NOT DEFAULT CLOTHES:} Program myfirsteverscript; Const startupwait = 9000;//how long before script starts after compiling treecolor1 = 5933691;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P treecolor2 = 2192739;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P treecolor3 = 3768947;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P =colorpicker for those of u who dont no. choppinginterval = 9000;// time before chopping each log drop = true; // do you wanna drop? if false set logs to chop to 28 logstochop = 27;//how many Logs to cut,//Watch the first 1or2 loads before changing this// {.include SRL/SRL.scar} Procedure _1stbasicautocutter_; var i, x, y: integer; Begin cleardebug; writeln('1st basic autocutter will begin soon,post comments bugs and ') writeln('All comments on the site were u got this') writeln('_1st basic autocutter_ has no futer updates as yet. Procced to site for futer updates') writeln('thanx for tresting and posting proggies') wait(startupwait+random(1000)) Repeat i:= i + 1 if (drop = true) then Dropall; Cleardebug; //======================================================== // writeln('~+~You sucessfully chopped~+~= ' + inttostr(i)) writeln('~+~You sucessfully dropped~+~= ' + inttostr(i)) writeln('Hopefully this script has been working for :) ' + timerunning) //==========================================================// If (FindColor(x, y, treecolor1, 0, 0, 517, 337)) or (FindColor(x, y, treecolor2, 0, 0, 517, 337)) and (FindColor(x, y, treecolor3, 0, 0, 517, 337))then mmouse(x,y,2,2) mouse(x,y,1,1,true) wait(choppinginterval+random(15000)) Until i = logstochop Writeln('script has worked for ' + timerunning) Writeln('logs chopped ' + inttostr(i)) Writeln('logs dropped ' +inttostr(i)) End; Begin setupsrl _1stbasicautocutter_ End.

item.title: My 1st ever script
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

[quote=“sonny bill 9, post:12, topic:156551”]well taking this out of my browser instead of this:

begin ClearDebug; GetSelf.WindowState := wsMinimized; MainBrowse; GetSelf.WindowState := wsNormal; if(EndBrowse)then TerminateScript; end.

you could have comething like this:

begin ClearDebug; GetSelf.WindowState := wsMinimized; MainBrowse; GetSelf.WindowState := wsNormal; if(EndBrowse)then TerminateScript; end.
just easier to read[/quote]

Scaper, I suggest you don’t listen to sonny bill or jvwarrior. They know next to nil about scripting, and they’ll only get you into bad habits. Case in point: the quoted text right above. Ask at srl-forums.com/forum if you haven’t already, I’m sure they’d be glad to offer you some non-bullshit help.

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st ever script
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

[code]{ _my1stbasicscript_BY
~~~ Scaper123 ~~~
+~+~+~+~+~+~+~1.0+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
+_________+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+_________+
~ Scaper_2007@msn.com ~

                          +~+ SCAR 3.12~DIVI,SRL4 +~+

======================================================================================================

 How to use: setup right below, that explains most of it please rember its my 1st script ever,
 note that this Basicautocuter won't work most area surronded by lots of trees i prefer to chop willows that are bulked together
          +~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~drops every 27 ore normaly! [WATCH  TO  LOADS]!!+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
 You can have Axe equipped/unequiped as it auto clicks jus have the right wcin lvl for the axe,don't wear any valuable items!!
 follow guied lines click play and enjoy remember to post progs bugs and anything else related
 I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILTY IF U GET BANNED USE AT YOUR OWN RISK NO ANTI/BAN/RANDOM AT PRESENT.
 IF U WANT TO FLAME ME ON ANYTHING PLZ REMBER THIS IS MY 1ST SCRIPT AND OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS ALL WILL BE CREDITED WHEN IM COMFORTABLE ABOUT IT
I STRONGLY ADVISE TO AUTO PROBLY I MEEN WITH: CHAR CB LVL ABOVE 10 NOT DEFAULT CLOTHES:}


Program myfirsteverscript;

Const
 startupwait = 9000;//how long before script starts after compiling
 treecolor1 = 5933691;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor2 = 2192739;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor3 = 3768947;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P =colorpicker for those of u who dont no.
 choppinginterval = 9000;// time before chopping each log
 drop = true; // do you wanna drop? if false set logs to chop to 28

 logstochop = 27;//how many Logs to cut,//Watch the first 1or2 loads before changing this//

 {.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Procedure _1stbasicautocutter_;

 var
 i, x, y: integer;
 Begin
cleardebug;
 writeln('1st basic autocutter will begin soon,post comments bugs and ')
 writeln('All comments on the site were u got this')
 writeln('_1st basic autocutter_ has no futer updates as yet. Procced to site for futer updates')
 writeln('thanx for tresting and posting proggies')

 wait(startupwait+random(1000))
Repeat

 i:= i + 1
 if (drop = true) then
Dropall;
Cleardebug;
 //======================================================== //
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully chopped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully dropped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('Hopefully this script has been working for  ' + timerunning)
 //==========================================================//


 If (FindColor(x, y, treecolor1, 0, 0, 517, 337)) or
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor2, 0, 0, 517, 337)) and
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor3, 0, 0, 517, 337))then
    mmouse(x,y,2,2)
    mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
  wait(choppinginterval+random(15000))
Until i = logstochop


 Writeln('script has worked for ' + timerunning)
 Writeln('logs chopped ' + inttostr(i))
 Writeln('logs dropped ' +inttostr(i))
End;

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin


  HowManyPlayers:= 1;
  NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
  CurrentPlayer:= 0;

  Players[0].Name        := '---------'; //UserName
  Players[0].Pass        := '---------'; //Password
  Players[0].Nick        := '----'; //Your Nickname - 3-4 leters
  Players[0].Active      := True; //Active

  Writeln('Using '+IntToStr(HowManyPlayers)+' Players');
  NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
end;
Begin
setupsrl
DeclarePlayers
_1stbasicautocutter_
End.[/code]

It compiles for me

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st ever script
item.dc:creator: @jvwarrior jvwarrior
item.description:
@jvwarrior wrote:

[quote=“scaper123, post:13, topic:156551”][quote author=sonny bill 9 link=topic=213575.msg1868781#msg1868781 date=1194236420]
well taking this out of my browser instead of this:

begin ClearDebug; GetSelf.WindowState := wsMinimized; MainBrowse; GetSelf.WindowState := wsNormal; if(EndBrowse)then TerminateScript; end.

you could have comething like this:

begin ClearDebug; GetSelf.WindowState := wsMinimized; MainBrowse; GetSelf.WindowState := wsNormal; if(EndBrowse)then TerminateScript; end.
just easier to read
[/quote]

ty m8 another thing check this oover for me i get error in line 31

Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin

HowManyPlayers:= 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:= 0;

Players[0].Name := ‘---------’; //UserName
Players[0].Pass := ‘---------’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘----’; //Your Nickname - 3-4 leters
Players[0].Active := True; //Active

Writeln(‘Using ‘+IntToStr(HowManyPlayers)+’ Players’);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
end;

put it in somewere plz

or yea and tell me if it right or wrong thanx for the helop ma appreciated[br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2007, 05:25:28 PM[/size][hr][code]Procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin

HowManyPlayers:= 1;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:= 0;

Players[0].Name := ‘---------’; //UserName
Players[0].Pass := ‘---------’; //Password
Players[0].Nick := ‘----’; //Your Nickname - 3-4 leters
Players[0].Active := True; //Active

Writeln(‘Using ‘+IntToStr(HowManyPlayers)+’ Players’);
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
end;[/code][/quote]

Ok first its better that if u want to clean up ure script use the program DelFor, It works.
and what i did for that NickNameBMP is isntead of placing it in that procedure i put it in the main loop.
For Ex.

Begin
setupsrl
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
_1stbasicautocutter_
end.

It works fine for me.

Read full topic

item.title: My 1st ever script
item.dc:creator: @scaper123 scaper123
item.description:
@scaper123 wrote:

well here it is it is very basic as im new to the scene but plz post proggies etc and things wat u cud improve on ty
{ _my1stbasicscript_BY
~~~ Scaper123 ~~~
+~+~+~+~+~+~+~1.0+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
+_________+~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~+_________+
~ Scaper_2007@msn.com ~

                          +~+ SCAR 3.12~DIVI,SRL4 +~+

======================================================================================================

 How to use: setup right below, that explains most of it please rember its my 1st script ever,
 note that this Basicautocuter won't work most area surronded by lots of trees i prefer to chop willows that are bulked together
          +~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~drops every 27 ore normaly! [WATCH  TO  LOADS]!!+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+~+
 You can have Axe equipped/unequiped as it auto clicks jus have the right wcin lvl for the axe,don't wear any valuable items!!
 follow guied lines click play and enjoy remember to post progs bugs and anything else related
 I TAKE NO RESPONSIBILTY IF U GET BANNED USE AT YOUR OWN RISK NO ANTI/BAN/RANDOM AT PRESENT.
 IF U WANT TO FLAME ME ON ANYTHING PLZ REMBER THIS IS MY 1ST SCRIPT AND OPEN TO SUGGESTIONS ALL WILL BE CREDITED WHEN IM COMFORTABLE ABOUT IT
I STRONGLY ADVISE TO AUTO PROBLY I MEEN WITH: CHAR CB LVL ABOVE 10 NOT DEFAULT CLOTHES:}


Program myfirsteverscript;

Const
 startupwait = 9000;//how long before script starts after compiling
 treecolor1 = 5933691;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor2 = 2192739;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P
 treecolor3 = 3768947;// set 3 tree colors ~CTRL+ALT+P =colorpicker for those of u who dont no.
 choppinginterval = 9000;// time before chopping each log
 drop = true; // do you wanna drop? if false set logs to chop to 28

 logstochop = 27;//how many Logs to cut,//Watch the first 1or2 loads before changing this//

 {.include SRL/SRL.scar}

Procedure _1stbasicautocutter_;

 var
 i, x, y: integer;
 Begin
cleardebug;
 writeln('1st basic autocutter will begin soon,post comments bugs and ')
 writeln('All comments on the site were u got this')
 writeln('_1st basic autocutter_ has no futer updates as yet. Procced to site for futer updates')
 writeln('thanx for tresting and posting proggies')

 wait(startupwait+random(1000))
Repeat

 i:= i + 1
 if (drop = true) then
Dropall;
Cleardebug;
 //======================================================== //
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully chopped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('~+~You sucessfully dropped~+~= ' + inttostr(i))
 writeln('Hopefully this script has been working for :) ' + timerunning)
 //==========================================================//


 If (FindColor(x, y, treecolor1, 0, 0, 517, 337)) or
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor2, 0, 0, 517, 337)) and
 (FindColor(x, y, treecolor3, 0, 0, 517, 337))then
    mmouse(x,y,2,2)
    mouse(x,y,1,1,true)
  wait(choppinginterval+random(15000))
Until i = logstochop


 Writeln('script has worked for ' + timerunning)
 Writeln('logs chopped ' + inttostr(i))
 Writeln('logs dropped ' +inttostr(i))
End;

Begin
setupsrl
_1stbasicautocutter_
End.</blockquote>

Read full topic
